description: Single storey extension to side and rear of house
decision_conditions: All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, ES6, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 5.9. | The roof to be created shall not be used to form a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area.  REASON:	To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B5, H33, Replacement UDP Policy 5.9. | The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
